sub_title: Warehouse Manager at Protone Backline Rental
summary:
Experienced Stage Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the events services industry, currently looking for new opportunities in the Netherlands.

Skilled in:
- Live Events
- Logistics Management
- Backline Management
- Festivals
- Stage Management
- Event Management
- Corporate Events. 

Postgraduate (Master Degree): Organisational Management and Human Resources Spiru Haret University, Human Resources Management.

profile_positions.description: Providing high quality backline for festivals, venues, TV/Radio shows.
profile_positions.title: Warehouse Manager

profile_positions.description:
Ensure that daily operations are running smoothly and required goals are met.
Working with 15 to 40 Shoppers across the Fulfillment Center.
Leading Shoppers to meet the organization's expectations for productivity, quality and goal accomplishment.
Monitoring and managing on-going workflow to ensure timely delivery.
Ensure that final products meet quality standards and customer specification.
Create an inspiring team environment with and open communication culture.

Creating a game plan for daily tasks.
Maintaining employee work schedules, including assignment and job rotation.
Support training of new recruits.
Monitoring productivity by using multiple sheets.
Updating productivity sheets in Google and Excel.
Being the first point of contact for employees on the work flow.
Completing daily reports
profile_positions.title: Team Lead FC1 Utrecht

profile_positions.description:
Team Lead Support - different logistics tasks across the Fulfillment Center (Outbound/Inbound).
Taking part in brainstorming sessions to improve processes.
Taking part in drafting the new Shopper + Work Guide / Overview.
Training members of the team in performing more advanced tasks.
Planning daily logistics actions. 
Making sure deadlines and targets are met by using Google Sheets / WMS.
Solving different logistic problems and monitoring departure and arrival times. 
Arranging truck loads.
Handy with Movexx and EPT.
Motivating teams to achieve daily goals.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Support FC1, Utrecht

profile_positions.description: Order picker at Picnic's Fulfillment Center in Utrecht. Apart from picking, I am actively involved in Receiving (Inbound), Dispatching (Outbound), Slotting (Operators' support), stock operations (Buffer, Counting) and more.
profile_positions.title: Shopper  FC1, Utrecht

profile_positions.description:
- Liaison between technical equipment suppliers (audio, lights, video, stage, SFX, backline), artists and promoter.

In advance: 
- Detailed advancing with the artists to make sure their technical riders are updated
- Making sure the technical suppliers got all the updates / latest versions of the tech riders
- Receiving final stage/tech specs and drawings from the suppliers and double checking to make sure they match the riders 
- Setting Stage Times / Schedule based on arrival times of each artist and the times they need to load in, set up, sound check, plus shows times, change over times and load out
- Sending out these tech info packages to each artist and discussing it in detail
- Offering support and answers at all times to the questions that both artists and tech suppliers have
- Operating any costs variables in the technical budget and announcing the Festival Director about this

On site: 
- Making sure that everything previously discussed with all crews involved takes place exactly as agreed
- Making sure all crews stick to times/schedule
- Trouble shooting, heads up's
- Paying attention to health and safety aspects and signaling any issues to the relevant people in charge
- Manage the numerous unpredictable situations that will appear
profile_positions.title: Stage Manager

profile_positions.title: Stage Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all tech matters related to live shows, parties, corporate events (Stage Manager / Production Manager)

- Recruiting crew members and training them
- Managing the shifts of the technical crew members
- Purchasing new equipment when needed
- Supervising rental, maintenance and service operations

In advance: 
- Detailed advancing with the artists to make sure their technical riders are updated
- Setting Stage Times / Schedule based on arrival times of each artist and the times they need to load in, set up, sound check, plus shows times, change over times and load out
- Sending out venue specs to each artist and discussing it in detail
- Offering support and answers at all times to the questions that both artists and tech suppliers have
- Operating any costs variables in the technical budget and announcing the Venue Director about this

On site: 
- Making sure that everything previously discussed with all crews involved takes place exactly as agreed
- Making sure all crews stick to times/schedule
- Trouble shooting, heads up's
- Hands on - when short staffed: backline set up, mics/monitors placing, patching, line check
- Paying attention to health and safety aspects and signaling any issues to the relevant people in charge
- Manage the numerous unpredictable situations that will appear

profile_positions.title: Stage Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Coordinating teams of technicians (rigging, sound, lights, video, backline, stagehands) during live and corporate events (Burger Fest 2015-2016, Artmania Festival, Bucharest Blast, Jazz Night Out Series, UEFA Champions League Final Bucharest, OMV, Mercedes Benz, Petrom, Toyota, Cosmote, Jack Daniels etc)
-	Stage Manager (local music festivals/shows)
-	Coordinating the load in/out and mantling of grass cover Portapath on stadiums in Romania and Bulgaria (Red Hot Chili Peppers, Depeche Mode, Roxette etc)
-	Logistics: Trucks/Tour bus management (Disney's Mickey's Magic Show, Lady Gaga, The Wall etc.)
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Managing the day to day activities of the music instruments department (The Backline Shop) of a technical production company (LivePro) - provider of technical equipment to the corporate event and live music industry in Romania/Bulgaria/Turkey
-	Analyzing technical riders and discussing with the artists representatives on the existing equipment and the possible substitutes
-	Finding new clients and staying in contact with existing ones
-	Preparation of backline for different events, from small concerts/parties to festivals
-	Contacting other local suppliers when the in house equipment was in short supply
-	Optimizing backline movements between events/stages happening at the same time
-	Checking equipment and making sure all the damages are repaired asap
-	Making lists of items that need to be bought (drum heads, guitar strings, parts, tools etc)
-	Putting together crews of technicians and coordinating them throughout particular events
-	Coordinating Loading in/out
-	Onstage/backstage technical assistance and troubleshooting
-	Driving 3,5t equipment vans or 8+1 crew vans
-	Updating Facebook pages with recent activities
-	Some of the bands/festivals/brands: Thievery Corporation, Sir Tom Jones, Status Quo, Mike And The Mechanics, The Animals (on their Kazakhstan tour dates), The Heavy, Kyla La Grange, Awolnation, Seether, Chris Norman, Bonnie Tyler, Enter Shikari, Foreign Beggars, James Walsh, Michael Bolton, Smokie, The Straits, Eric Sardinas, Snarky Puppy, Selah Sue, Smash Mouth, My Dying Bride, Tiamat, Samael, Biohazard, Children of Bodom, Napalm Death, Queensryche, Within Temptation, Electric Castle Festival, Peninsula Festival, Rock The City Festival, B'estfest, Artmania Festival, Mozaic Jazz Festival, OST Festival, Rockstadt Extreme Festival, Metalhead Meeting Festival, November to Desmember Festival, Mr. Green, Staropramen, Bergenbier, Jack Daniels etc
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager
